评论详情: The hoodie is very comfortable and good material. I normally wear a small in men’s hoodies, so I ordered a small but it’s a tad tight. So maybe go up one size just in case because they do seem to run a little bit small.

评论概述: Sleeves are too short and the large fits like a small!
评论详情: Not what I expected...this sweatshirt seems like it was put in the dryer on high heat and shrunk. Sleeves fit like a Pee Wee Herman suit. Very disappointed in this purchase and will not buy from them again.
My son loved it. It fit as expected and it is super comfortable.
Such a fun gift for the kid who just hasn't picked a school yet or any Animal House/John Belushi lovers out there. My nephew loved it!
Purchased this for my teenage son. He has no appreciation for the original movie that it’s based on. Makes me laugh when he wears it. Especially fun to wear during a college campus tour. Fits well!

评论概述: Awesome product. A little tight in the neck, but amazingly comfy.
评论详情: Great hoodie. A little tight around the neck for my taste, and I have a skinny neck, but that’s pretty typical for pullovers. It just might be something someone would wanna know if they’re not a fan of hoodies that cling tightly around the neck. It’s very soft and well shaped, though and I love it! It’s my new fav hoodie.
Perfect for your inner Belushi.
It's great, get one

Despite the stock photo, product description, and even the sticker on the package that arrived stating this was a hooded sweatshirt, it was just a regular no-hood sweatshirt. Other reviews say otherwise, so maybe I just got one that slipped thru quality control. Buyer be warned.
I love this hoodie!  It’s comfortable and stylish!
Animal House
My nephew loves his new sweatshirt! Comfy, runs a bit small.

Super cool hoodie. I was so surprised at the quality. I was skeptical about buying this online because quality can be an issue. However, many of the reviews said the quality was outstanding and I agree. I may be purchasing another soon..
Love it! Cute and comfy :-) And it’s always fun to get a laugh!

I love the look and all but theres a few downsides. Its Gilden so that describes the quality and size. (If you dont know its a little smaller for taller people and isnt high quality but most merch and stuff uses Gildan brand) I wouldnt wash it in hot water. Mine also got a small rip on the arm i didn’t realize at first but that might not be their fault could be the wearhouses.
Screen print is a bit hokey, but we love the hoodie.  It's getting the job done, user loves the "feel" of the sweatshirt.
Fit as Expected, Delivery was easy... Fabric was a little nylonier than I thought it would be.. but will soften with wash
Godson loves it! A great comfy sweatshirt!
I live in this sweatshirt since I got it. So comfortable

评论概述: Since it was in good taste, they let it slide and it has ...
评论详情: My son is required to wear uniforms at school.  It is a "college prep" school, so they allow sweatshirts with college logos.  He couldn't decide on a university he wanted one from, so I bought him this one.  It was a big hit among his friends and it took weeks before the teachers even noticed that it was a joke. Since it was in good taste, they let it slide and it has become his favorite sweatshirt.  Hah!!  Love it!
Good quality, fits a tint bit big, which is a good thing for a hoody.
